message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. I think it's a fair price considering what you'll gain from it.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of the product,  $18,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $18,000 is really the lowest I can go right now.  This product is in high demand and I've had other offers closer to my asking price.  I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
